webwork-tex.statement:
{\bf 13. {\footnotesize (1 point) \path|Library/NAU/setDiscrete/RecurrReln_order2_distinct01.pg|}}\newline Find the solution to the following lhcc recurrence:\leavevmode\\\relax \(a_{n} = 0 a_{n-1} + 121 a_{n-2} \text{ for } n \geq 3\) with initial conditions \(a_0 = 4, a_1 = -176\).
\leavevmode\\\relax
\(a_n =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
\par
